quests.desc: You are now playing a fast paced episode of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, pick up the type 1 key from the trunk within the recreation zone. After that, unlock the type 1 safe in the recreation zone. And if you do that, you're the winner!
commands: unlock type 1 safe with type 1 key
unlock type 1 safe with type 1 key

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a recreation zone. A typical kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can make out a type 1 safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The type 1 safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] Were you looking for a trunk? Because look over there, it's a trunk.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a dish-pit.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: type 1 safe
infos.desc: The type 1 safe looks strong, and impossible to open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to crack open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: type 1 key
infos.desc: The type 1 key is cold to the touch

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to retrieve the type 1 key from the trunk. After that, unlock the type 1 safe with the type 1 key. Alright, thanks!

main_quest.desc: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to retrieve the type 1 key from the trunk. After that, unlock the type 1 safe with the type 1 key. Alright, thanks!
commands: unlock type 1 safe with type 1 key
